SELECT
TLM.MEMBER_SEQ /*담당자시퀀스*/ ,TLM.MEMBER_ID /*담당자ID*/ ,TLM.PASSWORD /*비밀번호*/ ,TLM.COM_CODE /*회원사코드*/ ,TLM.MEMBER_NAME /*담당자이름*/ ,TLM.EMAIL /*이메일*/ ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.EXTENSION_NO) AS EXTENSION_NO /*회사전화번호*/ ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.MOBILE_NO) AS MOBILE_NO /*휴대폰번호*/ ,TLM.DEPT_NM /*부서명*/ ,TLM.POSITION_NM /*직위명*/ ,case when TLM.JOIN_DT = '' then null when TLM.JOIN_DT is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.JOIN_DT,'YYYYMMDD') end AS JOIN_DT ,TLM.APPR_STAT /*승인상태*/ ,TLM.FILE_SEQ /*첨부파일ID*/ ,TLM.FAIL_CNT /*로그인 실패횟수*/ ,TLM.CRE_YN /*협회여부*/ ,TLM.DROP_YN /*탈퇴여부*/ ,TLM.UPD_SEQ /*수정자 시퀀스*/ ,TLM.UPD_TIMESTAMP /*수정 일시*/ ,TLM.OPTION_TERMS_YN /*선택적약관동의*/ FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS TLM
AND TLM.COM_CODE = (SELECT COM_CODE FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS WHERE MEMBER_SEQ = #{regSeq})
AND TLM.APPR_STAT = #{apprStat}

SELECT TLM.MEMBER_SEQ /*담당자시퀀스*/ ,TLM.MEMBER_ID /*담당자ID*/ ,TLM.MEMBER_NAME /*담당자이름*/ ,TLM.EMAIL /*이메일*/ ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.EXTENSION_NO) AS EXTENSION_NO /*회사전화번호*/ ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.MOBILE_NO) AS MOBILE_NO /*휴대폰번호*/ ,TLM.DEPT_NM /*부서명*/ ,TLM.POSITION_NM /*직위명*/ ,case when TLM.JOIN_DT = '' then null when TLM.JOIN_DT is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.JOIN_DT,'YYYYMMDD') end AS JOIN_DT ,TLM.FILE_SEQ /*첨부파일ID*/ ,TLM.MSG /*가승인 사유*/ ,TLM.OPTION_TERMS_YN /*선택적약관동의*/ FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS TLM
AND TLM.MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}

SELECT TLM.MEMBER_SEQ /*담당자시퀀스*/ ,TLM.MEMBER_ID /*담당자ID*/ ,TLM.MEMBER_NAME /*담당자이름*/ ,TLM.EMAIL /*이메일*/ ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.EXTENSION_NO) AS EXTENSION_NO /*회사전화번호*/ ,FN_CELLPHONE(TLM.MOBILE_NO) AS MOBILE_NO /*휴대폰번호*/ ,TLM.DEPT_NM /*부서명*/ ,TLM.POSITION_NM /*직위명*/ ,case when TLM.JOIN_DT = '' then null when TLM.JOIN_DT is null then null else TO_DATE(TLM.JOIN_DT,'YYYYMMDD') end AS JOIN_DT ,TLM.FILE_SEQ /*첨부파일ID*/ ,TLM.MSG /*가승인 사유*/ ,TLM.APPR_STAT /*승인여부*/ ,TLM.OPTION_TERMS_YN /*선택적약관동의*/ FROM TB_LC_MEMBERS TLM
AND TLM.MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}

UPDATE TB_LC_MEMBERS SET UPD_TIMESTAMP = NOW() /*수정일시*/ ,UPD_SEQ = #{updSeq} /*수정자 시퀀스*/
,FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq} /*첨부파일시퀀스*/
,MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} /*담당자ID*/
,PASSWORD = #{password} /*패스워드*/
,DEPT_NM = CONCAT(TRIM(#{deptNm}), '') /*부서명*/
,MEMBER_NAME = CONCAT(TRIM(#{memberName}), '') /*담당자이름*/
,POSITION_NM = CONCAT(TRIM(#{positionNm}), '') /*직위명*/
,EMAIL = #{email} /*이메일*/
,EXTENSION_NO = REPLACE(#{extensionNo}, '-', '') /*회사전화번호*/
,MOBILE_NO = REPLACE(#{mobileNo}, '-', '') /*휴대폰번호*/
,OPTION_TERMS_YN = #{optionTermsYn} /*선택적 약관동의*/
AND MEMBER_SEQ = #{memberSeq}
